ack.p: This research was conducted at Wageningen University as part of the project “Realizing the agricultural potential of inland valley lowlands in sub-Saharan Africa while maintaining their environmental services” (RAP-IV). The project is implemented by the Africa Rice Center and its national partners and is funded by the European Commission through the International Fund for Agricultural Development (IFAD). We thank Rik Leemans for his invaluable comments on an earlier version of this manuscript.
